channel.title: relationship on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in relationship on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Girl I'm looking for
item.description: How it started I’ve been alone for a while, and I’m getting old(30+), I started feeling the urgency to get a partner in crime. So I asked around, people always ask back “what kind of girl are you looking for? " I hate not able to articulate that well, so I decided to write it down, since there is nothing secret about it. Basically I’m looking for a girl who is just like me, sound quite narcissistic, but that’s my genuine feeling.
